property.name: db.ignore.internal.links
property.description: If true, when adding new links to a page, links from the same host are ignored. This is an effective way to limit the size of the link database, keeping the only the highest quality links.

property.name: fetcher.server.delay
property.description: The number of seconds the fetcher will delay between successive requests to the same server.

property.name: http.max.delays
property.description: The number of times a thread will delay when trying to fetch a page. When using the crawl tool there are likely to be very few different hosts, so we need to be willing to wait longer for each.
